snippet: Luck smiled on State Representative Blaine Eaton II, who had been forced by law to draw a straw for his seat after his race for re-election ended in a tie.
abstract: Tie between Democrat Blaine Eaton II and Republican challenger Mark Tullos for House District 79 seat in Mississippi is settled by literal drawing of straws in short, odd ceremony presided over by state officials, including Gov Phil Bryant; Eaton emerges victor; game of chance carried high stakes as win by Tullos would have given Republicans three-fifths supermajority, threshold required to pass revenue-related bills.
lead_paragraph: Luck smiled on State Representative Blaine Eaton II, who had been forced by law to draw a straw for his seat after his race for re-election ended in a tie.

headline.main: Democrat Wins Mississippi House Race After Drawing Straw
headline.print_headline: Tied State House Race in Mississippi Is Decided by a Straw
